gerbv Index Page

1.1.0

Introduction

gerbv is part of gEDA tools.

It displays gerberfiles in an overlayable multilayer fashion and it also allows to measure distances.
Searching (powerful wildcard search in a browsable list) for electronic parts is available once a so-called pick and place file has been read in (by definition there is only one for each project).
Apart from saving projects files, it also can export PNG graphics.

The doxygen config file is called Doxyfile.nopreprocessing and is located in the /doc directory of gerbv.

Project Manager is Stefan Petersen < speatstacken.kth.se >
